topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55342d796368721c72390c00#post_55342d796368721c72390c00
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55342c60636872239e880f00#post_55342c60636872239e880f00
now here's the real question

can you have multiple devil fruit powers? [/bq]
That's actually a biiiiiig question right now. Spoilers for One Piece ahead. But short answer. No.
[spoiler]It actually SHOULDN'T be possible to have multiple DF powers. If you eat more than one your body will basically shut down and you'll die. However Marshal D. Teach actually managed to have TWO DF powers. The Yami Yami no Mi and the Gura Gura no Mi. How he did it we don't know yet. [/spoiler]

Also, funny thing about how humans work when they buy things.
They want something that they don't have money for.
When they do have money for it, they won't buy it because they care about their money more.
